item.title: Metro rail strike averted, still uncertainty persists
item.description: The metro-rail operator has narrowly averted a fresh strike after its board approved long-pending service rules last week, easing immediate tensions with agitating staff. However, officials and employees alike fear that delays in making the rules effective could once again destabilise operations.
